text_block_list.text:
――Ardan-san. Chiyono O-san. For making time in your busy schedule 
to accompany me, I'm truly thankful.
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
No. I'm the one that should be thankful, 
I'm honored that you would ask me. Yaeno-san, 
I'll assist you to the best of my abilities.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Me too! It'll give me the chance to study Yaeno-san's training 
results from up close!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
With the goal of [The Fusion of Fire and Water] during a race, 
we had begun special training to master tactics.

Today is the day we test the results of that training, 
with Mejiro Ardan and Sakura Chiyono O, who are aiming to debut at the 
same time. I had requested parallel running!

For your thorough guidance up until now, you have my heartfelt gratitude. 
All that's left is the race itself―― the results of my 
training, I will confirm them myself!
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa―― 
Fuu……！！
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
During the middle stage of the race. Sakura Chiyono O was taking 
a leading position, up until now this would have normally 
disrupted Yaeno's pace, however……
(……First. Be concious of your lap time.)
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
(The speed and pace I need to maintain, I must engrave them in to my body…… 
Don't be led astray by others, I must persist！)
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
Fuu…… fuu…… 
……――！
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Haaa……！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
As they approached the corner, Mejiro Ardan moved in, 
aiming for a favorable position―― however, having calmly analyzed the situation, 
Yaeno Muteki responded superbly！

(First. Read your opponent. 
You must predict the race progression)
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
……As I thought, Ardan-san excels at technique. She has fully 
grasped her own weaknesses, therefore her tactics focus on 
precision, with the confidence to calmly execute――！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
(Picture the opponent within your own mind, picture 
their run repeatedly, many times…… You must formulate 
a plan for certain victory)
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: And then――！！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: ――Haaa！！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
(Now let it burn！ Burn！ Let your spirit burn！ 
Just like a raging inferno！ Do not fear the Ardent Flame 
within, do not let it overwhelm you！)
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
(Do not yield the lead！！ Do not yield it to anyone！ 
The one who will be victorious―― will be me！！)
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: OoOOOOOOOOOOOo！！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
And with that, Yaeno Muteki magnificently―― 
crossed the goal first.
Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa――
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』…… right here, has been achieved！！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: Yaeno-san―― that was wonderful.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Ha！ ……I apologize. 
Before properly thanking you, I celebrated victory……
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
No！ Really, the Yaeno-san just now…… was amazing！ 
More than I've seen up until now, how should 
I put it, you had the most spirit……！
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Yes. And also―― as an opponent from the same generation, 
it was an exceedingly intimidating feeling.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Well then. ……Chiyono O-san, will you be free shortly after this？ 
……so that we won't lose to this awakened rival, 
we'll have to continue training.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, let's！！ 
……We won't lose next time, Yaeno-san！！
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
……That's right. I can't lose either. In the Twinkle Series too, 
I will definitely be victorious……
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: (And to do that――)
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
choice_data_list: <size=43>Good work! That was a great run……！</size>

text_block_list.text: ……Aah, you came at just the right moment.
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: Could I ask you to accompany me for a while longer？
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
The place she brought me, was the place where we had first met. 
After turning towards me, Yaeno Muteki spoke――
The Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Kata, have you memorized them yet？
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
If that's the case, please―― perform them together with me. 
Please accompany me.
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: ……――Alright, let's begin.
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
Confused by her sudden urging, I took my stance. 
And then……
Haa！！ ……Seii！！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: Fuu！！ ……Tooou！！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
I earnestly followed along, but I wasn't entirely sure if I 
performed them properly. While I was conscious of my posture, 
my movements were nowhere near as sharp as hers.

But still―― while I was repeatedly taking my stance and 
progressing through, I felt a mysterious connection between us.
Thank you very much！！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: ……Um. ……Was I able to properly convery it？
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
With each swing of my fist, and each movement 
of my body, I intended to pour everything into it. 
Everything I wanted to convey to you――
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text: That I believe in you wholeheartedly.
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
Because of your guidance, I was able to arrive at the state of 
mind for 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』. Please, from now on, 
may I continue to receive guidance from you？
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-dono. As someone who is an expert in regards to racing, 
from now on―― by all means, please continue to instruct me！
text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
choice_data_list: Yeah, I look forward to it!
Yeah, I look forward to it!

text_block_list.text:
And like this, I became the trainer 
responsible for Yaeno Muteki……！
